resp = client.search(
    query={
        "match": {
            "user.id": "kimchy"
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.search(
    index="_all",
    query={
        "match": {
            "user.id": "kimchy"
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="*",
    query={
        "match": {
            "user.id": "kimchy"
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
